programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: Al Moukhtafi
programme.desc: Four friends investigate the mysterious disappearance of the husband of one of them, which pushes them into a world of betrayal and false allegations.

programme.title: Tariq El Ward
programme.desc: The series revolves around a young village woman who is fond of roses. When she faces a major problem that puts her in the center of family conflicts, she is forced to flee her village for the city in search of a better future, but her journey will be full of problems and difficulties.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Susan Plummer, a close friend of Robert McCall, dies while looking into a murder-suicide. He uses his resources and experience as a former spy and marine to track out the assailant and exact revenge on her.

programme.title: Roman J Israel, Esq.
programme.desc: The idealistic defense lawyer Roman J. Israel is trying to take over responsibility after his partner has suffered a heart attack. Under pressure to find a new job, he works with his partner's friend George. He exploits one of the cases he's working on to his advantage, putting him in a major problem.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically modified spider that gives him superhuman abilities, while he secretly loves Mary. Norman Osborn, is an eccentric millionaire who uses a new form of performance-enhancing drugs to become the Green Goblin, so Peter must confront him to save his family and friends.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: In Chicago, six strangers received invitations from Minos Escape Room Facility for a chance to win US$ 1 million. The game begins in the waiting room, the first in a series of treacherous rooms that were each specifically designed to relate to the life of one of them. Together they must find the rooms' clues and solve their puzzles; or die.

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of the first-ever black-American Supreme Court Justice, Thurgood Marshall, working on a case that could determine the success of his career.

programme.title: Thuluj alsayf
programme.desc: Among people’s every day stories, Ahmed and Nabila share love but their careers matter a lot in supporting their families. In Laila’s story, she is an undergraduate whose family depends on her father’s small income, and she seldom sees her married siblings. A third story is about Bothayna and Salah who are happily married with a son, but are parted when Salah gets shot while chasing smugglers.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Bombay Talkies

programme.desc: Farah fled Iran and is now employed illegally as a cleaner in Istanbul. Her life is turned upside down when she witnesses a murder at work, preventing her from traveling to France to care for her ill son. She then makes an attempt to flee from the criminals after they identify her.

programme.title: Khareef Omar
programme.desc: Follows a retired lawyer whose daughter is subjected to violence by her husband while they are residing in another country. As he tries hard to protect her through legal means, he faces many obstacles and is forced to use other methods.

programme.title: Haroun's Mother (Ep17)
programme.desc: Drama, People 2020 A woman suffers from a lot of problems when she converts to Judaism in a society overwhelmed with racism. Hayat Al Fahed , Mohamed Gaber, Ahmed Al Jasmy , Abdel Mohsen Al Nemr, Soaad Ali, Faghriya Khamis, Fouad Ali, Mohamed Jamal Al Adl, Muhammad Shams

programme.title: Del Ragel
programme.desc: When his daughter Shahd is injured in a violent accident, the life of Galal turns upside down. Dr. Malak sympathizes with his crisis, as she tries to help him seek the justice that his daughter is due and to get out of his ordeal.

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep25)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance, Bollywood 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Jyoti Tiwari, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Arbeeny Fy el Eshreen
programme.desc: Fahd wakes up after a coma that lasted nearly twenty years and finds himself at the age of forty. He tries to remember and learn everything he has missed. He is surprised by his wife's (Ahd) divorce from him, and her closeness to his cousin Saleh. He finds himself at a crossroads, either to continue alone or to defend his previous life and recover it, whatever the consequences are.

programme.title: Ghamam's Island (Ep15)
programme.desc: Thriller, History, Fantasy, Romance, Drama 2022 Everything turns upside down on Ghamam Island when Shiekh Madien gives the sins note to his follower before his death, a drowned body by coincidence is discovered, and a gypsy shows up in the village. Tareq Lotfy, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Mai Ezz Al Din, Ahmed Amin, Wafaa Amer, Mohamed Gom`aa, Riyad Al Khouly, Hussein El Menbawy, Abdel Rahim Kamal

programme.title: Bab Al Harah (Ep5)
programme.desc: Drama, Thriller 2009 Grief controls the people living in the district. As a lot of young people where killed in the last battle. But that doesn't stop them defending their beloved district. Milad Youssef, Mona Wasef, Sabah Al Jazaaery, Wael Sharaf, Wafeeq Al Zaeem, Bassam Al Molla, Kamal Morra

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep71)
programme.desc: Comedy, Romance 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. programme.title: Jazeerat Ghamam

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbi's son, Mohamed, who loves Khalil's daughter.

programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: End Share 9
programme.desc: After he became wealthy following an unexpected event that took place years ago, Fares finds himself targeted by Adnan and a person close to him.

programme.title: Nassibi w Esmetek 4
programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.

programme.desc: Cyfres newydd: awn ar wyliau byr yng Nghymru. Dau griw, dwy gyllideb wahanol: sut hwyl gawn nhw? New series. Two crews, two different budgets: who will have the most fun? First up: Brecon. [SL]

programme.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris Norwy - Season 1, Episode 1
Siwrna Scandi Chris
programme.desc: Mae Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts ar siwrna Scandi, yn profi a'n coginio'r gorau o fwydydd Norwy. Welsh fire chef Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts starts his epic Scandi food journey in Norway. [SL]

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd efo pobl ledled Cymru'n ymweld â'r 'sgubor i ofyn i'r tîm cynllunio creadigol i greu blodau syfrdanol ar gyfer pobol haeddiannol fel syrpreis. New series about expert florists. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer Bethan Ellis Owen
Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Ar Sgwrs Dan y Lloer gynta'r gyfres, cawn ymweld â gardd a chartref yr actores, Bethan Ellis Owen. In the latest series of Sgwrs Dan y Lloer, Elin Fflur chats with actress Bethan Elis Owen. [SL]

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Connacht v Scarlets
programme.desc: Gêm fyw Pencampwriaeth Rygbi Unedig rhwng Connacht a'r Scarlets. Stadiwm Galway Galway. Live United Rugby Championship game: Connaught v Scarlets. Galway Greyhound Stadium. K/O 5.05.

programme.desc: Gêm fyw Pencampwriaeth Rygbi Unedig rhwng Caerdydd a Leinster. Parc yr Arfau. C/G 7.35. Live United Rugby Championship game between Cardiff and Leinster. Cardiff Arms Park. K/O 7.35.

programme.title: Stryd i'r Sgrym
programme.desc: Bydd Rhian, hyfforddwr y tîm, yn cwrdd â'i harwr hyfforddi, Warren Gatland, wrth iddo baratoi tîm Cymru ar gyfer y Chwe Gwlad. The team meet their rugby hero - ex-captain Ken Owens.

programme.title: Bwyd Epic Chris Cebab Cig Oen - Season 1, Episode 1
Bwyd Chris Byr
programme.desc: Risét o drydedd cyfres Bwyd Epic Chris - Cebab Cig Oen. A recipe from the third series of Bwyd Epic Chris - Lamb Kebabs.

Deuawdau Rhys Meirion

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Mae Tîm Po yn gymorth i Ffarmwr wrth gasglu ei flodau. Team Po helps a flower grower in need of some flower picking power.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Jen eisiau chwarae 'nyrsio' a daw ei chyfle pan glywir bod un o anifeiliaid y jwngl yn sâl. Jen wants to play 'nurse' and she gets a chance when one of her jungle friends falls ill.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae'n Ddiwrnod y Ddraig ac eleni mae Digbi'n benderfynol o hedfan ei orau glas. It's Dragon Day, and this year, Digby's determined to beat his best-ever flying record.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu, i droi sbwriel yn sbeshal a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins pupils from Ysgol Gynradd Llanfairpwllgwyngyll, to create a superb treasure.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Bydd taith heddiw'n mynd â ni i Fongolia sydd yn Asia - gwlad sy'n bell iawn o'r arfordir sy'n gartref i'r anialwch Gobi. We go to Mongolia where native people called Nomads live in tents.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dilyn mamau pengwin ymerodrol sydd ar eu ffordd adref at eu teuluoedd. The Octonauts follow emperor penguin mums returning to their families.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Morgan y neidr filtroed a Lola a'i ieir. Today we meet Morgan the millipede and Lola and her hens.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Maer Campus yn camgymryd teclyn rhagweld tywydd Capten Cimwch am beiriant all newid y tywydd! Today, due to a mistake, Gwil and the pups have to save the blimp and Mayor Campus!

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series. Today's theme is the sense of smell.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Wrth fynd allan i'r môr, mae Twt a Tanwen yn dod o hyd i forfil yn sownd yn y rhew. Twt and Tanwen come across a whale stuck in the ice. How will they free him?

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dewi Sant sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dewi Sant join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae'r gwencïod yn clywed fod Crawc ofn bwganod brain ac yn manteisio ar y ffaith i ddychryn Crawc allan o'i gartref. The weasels hear of Toad's fear of scarecrows.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw.

programme.title: Mynyddoedd y Byd Corea: Stephen Evans
Mynyddoedd y Byd: Corea
programme.desc: Stephen Evans sy'n mentro mas o Seoul i geisio deall pam bod yr uchelfannau mor agos at galonnau'r bobl. Stephen Evans asks why the mountains are so important to the citizens of South Korea.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod prysur i'r unig ddwy Glesni sy'n fets cofrestredig yn y DU - a'r ddwy yn gweithio yn Ystwyth Fets. Sheepdog, Fan, is rushed to the practice and Nessy the snake slithers in!

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Tro hwn, mae aelodau ac arweinwyr Côr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen Caernarfon am ddiolch i'w harweinydd am sefydlu'r côr. This time: a floral thanks to the founder of Côr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol Mis Hanes LHDTC+ - Season 1, Episode 1
Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: I nodi Mis Hanes LHDTC+, bydd Nia yn yr Almaen i gwrdd â'r Cymro alltud John Sam Jones, dyn hoyw sy'n adrodd stori ryfeddol o faddeuant, trugaredd a chariad. We mark LGBTQ+ History Month.

programme.title: Dan Do
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: ymweliad â thy hynafol yng Nghonwy sy'n llawn nodweddion annisgwyl. We visit a grand Edwardian home in the capital and an old miners cottage in the heart of Cwmtawe.

programme.title: Tir Cymru O Dan y Môr
Tir Cymru
programme.desc: Bydd Iolo Williams yn darganfod y cyfoeth o fywyd gwyllt sy'n byw o dan y môr o amgylch arfordir Cymru. Iolo Williams discovers the wealth of wildlife under the sea on the Welsh coast.

programme.title: Ffilmiau Ddoe Huw Stephens - Season 1, Episode 3
Ffilmiau Ddoe
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, ffilmiau am Gaerdydd fydd yn cael sylw Huw Stephens a Hanna Jarman. Huw Aaron looks at early examples of animation from The National Library of Wales' Screen and Sound Archive.

programme.title: Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Awn i Abertawe am y rhaglen olaf i dy smart llawn potensial ger Parc Cwmdoncyn. We head to Swansea for the last programme, to a smart house full of considerable potential in Cwmdonkin Park.

programme.title: Ar Werth
programme.desc: Ymdrech i werthu cartref sydd wedi bod ar y farchnad ers pedair blynedd, ac ymgais i symud cyn i fabi gyrraedd! An endeavour to sell a home that's been on the market for four years!

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad Wini Jones Lewis - Season 1, Episode 1
Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn a'r artist o Ben Llyn, Wini Jones Lewis, sy'n teithio'r wlad yn dehongli a chofnodi'r tirluniau sy'n dal ei llygaid. We meet local Pen Llyn artist, Wini, who paints the countryside.

programme.title: New: Clwb Rygbi: Ulster v Dreigiau
programme.desc: Cyfle arall i weld gêm Pencampwriaeth Rygbi Unedig Ulster v Dreigiau, a chwaraewyd ddoe yn Stadiwm Kingspan. Another chance to see the URC Ulster v Dragons game, played yesterday in Belfast.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros ddigwyddiadau'r wythnos yng Nghwmderi. Omnibus edition looking back at events in the fictional village of Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol Gwyl Dewi - Season 1, Episode 1
New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Lisa Gwilym sy'n dathlu Gwyl Ddewi gyda rhai o bobl ysbrydoledig Wrecsam. Daw ein hemynau gwladgarol o Eglwys San Silyn yn y ddinas. We celebrate an inspiring St David's Day in Wrexham.

programme.title: New: Am Dro
programme.desc: Tro hwn awn efo Ceri, Dyfan, Catrin ac Andrew i Ben Dinas, Sir Benfro; Cwm Elan; Abertawe; a Rhos-y-gwaliau, Bala. Today's walks are in Pembrokeshire, Elan Valley, Swansea & the Bala area.

programme.title: Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Mae Gogglebocs Cymru 'nôl. Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i sbio ar deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back, with laughter, tears and arguments.

programme.title: Adam Price a Streic y Glowyr
Adam Price a Streic y Glowyr
programme.desc: Adam Price sy'n cwrdd â gwrthwynebwyr achos y glowyr, Norman Tebbitt a Nigel Lawson. Adam meets the opponents of the miners' cause, Norman Tebbitt and Nigel Lawson, in the first of three.

programme.title: Y Ditectif Operation Julie - Season 2, Episode 3
Y Ditectif
programme.desc: Mali Harries sy'n olrhain hanes Operation Julie, un o'r ymchwiliadau cudd mwyaf ym Mhrydain. Mali Harries explores evidence from undercover drugs investigation, Operation Julie.
